TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ArgumentOutOfRangeException extends System.ArgumentException implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
type ArgumentOutOfRangeException = class inherit ArgumentException interface ISerializable

summary.span: 當引數值超出了叫用 (Invoke) 方法所定義值的容許範圍時所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when the value of an argument is outside the allowable range of values as defined by the invoked method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時叫用方法，且至少其中一個傳遞給方法的引數不擲回例外狀況`null`和包含無效的值不是預期的引數的值集合的成員。An exception is thrown when a method is invoked and at least one of the arguments passed to the method is not `null` and contains an invalid value that is not a member of the set of values expected for the argument. 屬性會識別無效的引數，而屬性，如果值存在，會識別無效的值。The property identifies the invalid argument, and the property, if a value is present, identifies the invalid value. 一般而言，天時，開發人員的錯誤。Typically, an results from developer error. 而不是處理中的例外狀況`try` / `catch`區塊中，您應該刪除例外狀況的原因，或如果方法呼叫所傳回的引數或由使用者輸入才能傳遞至方法，會擲回例外狀況您應該驗證引數，再將它們傳遞至方法。Instead of handling the exception in a `try`/`catch` block, you should eliminate the cause of the exception or, if the argument is returned by a method call or input by the user before being passed to the method that throws the exception, you should validate arguments before passing them to the method. 經常使用： is used extensively by: - 中的類別和命名空間。Classes in the and namespaces. - 類別。The class. - 字串操作方法，在類別。String manipulation methods in the class. 情況擲回例外狀況包含下列項目：The conditions in which an exception is thrown include the following: 您要的索引編號，來擷取集合的成員和索引編號無效。You are retrieving the member of a collection by its index number, and the index number is invalid. 這是最常見的原因例外狀況。This is the most common cause of an exception. 通常，索引編號是無效的三個原因之一：Typically, the index number is invalid for one of three reasons: - 集合具有任何成員，和您的程式碼會假設它沒有。The collection has no members, and your code assumes that it does. 下列範例會嘗試擷取第一個元素的集合，其中沒有任何項目：The following example attempts to retrieve the first element of a collection that has no elements: [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/NoElements.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/NoElements.vb#4)] 若要避免這個例外狀況，請檢查是否在集合的`Count`屬性大於零，再嘗試擷取任何成員，如下列程式碼片段。To prevent the exception, check whether the collection's `Count` property is greater than zero before attempting to retrieve any members, as the following code fragment does. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/NoElements.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/NoElements.vb#5)] 在某些情況下，這可能是因為您嘗試將成員新增至集合，使用索引不存在，而不是呼叫方法，例如`Add`，，有針對此目的。In some cases, this may occur because you are attempting to add a member to a collection by using an index that does not exist, rather than by calling the method, such as `Add`, that exists for this purpose. 下列範例會嘗試將項目新增至集合中，使用不存在的索引，而不是呼叫方法。The following example attempts to add an element to a collection by using a non-existent index rather than calling the method. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/NoElements2.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/NoElements2.vb#13)] 下列程式碼片段會更正這個錯誤：The following code fragment corrects this error: [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/NoElements2.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/NoElements2.vb#14)] - 您嘗試擷取其索引是負值的項目。You're attempting to retrieve an item whose index is negative. 這通常是因為您搜尋特定項目的索引集合，錯誤地假設搜尋已成功。This usually occurs because you've searched a collection for the index of a particular element and have erroneously assumed that the search is successful. 在下列範例中，呼叫方法無法找到字串等於"Z"，因此會傳回-1。In the following example, the call to the method fails to find a string equal to "Z" and so returns -1. 不過，這是無效的索引值。However, this is an invalid index value. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/BadSearch.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/BadSearch.vb#6)] 若要避免這個例外狀況，請檢查確定傳回的索引大於或等於零，再嘗試從集合擷取項目，如以下程式碼片段會搜尋已成功。To prevent the exception, check that the search is successful by making sure that the returned index is greater than or equal to zero before attempting to retrieve the item from the collection, as the following code fragment does. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/BadSearch.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/BadSearch.vb#7)] - 您嘗試擷取其索引為集合的值相等的項目`Count`屬性，如下列範例說明。You're attempting to retrieve an element whose index is equal to the value of the collection's `Count` property, as the following example illustrates. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/OOR2.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/OOR2.vb#8)] 因為.NET Framework 中的集合會使用以零為起始的索引，集合的第一個元素位於索引 0，而且最後一個元素位於索引`Count`-1。Because collections in the .NET Framework use zero-based indexing, the first element of the collection is at index 0, and the last element is at index `Count` - 1. 您可以讓您存取索引處的最後一個元素，以避免錯誤`Count`-1，如下列程式碼。You can eliminate the error by ensuring that you access the last element at index `Count` - 1, as the following code does. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/OOR2.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/OOR2.vb#9)] 您嘗試呼叫字串操作方法，來執行字串作業，並在字串中沒有起始的索引。You are attempting to perform a string operation by calling a string manipulation method, and the starting index does not exist in the string. 例如這類方法的多載， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，或，可讓您指定的起始索引作業都需要索引字串內的有效位置。Overloads of methods such as such as , , , , , , , , or that allow you to specify the starting index of the operation require that the index be a valid position within the string. 有效索引範圍從 0 到-1。Valid indexes range from 0 to - 1. 有四個常見的原因，這個例外狀況：There are four common causes of this exception: - 您正在使用空字串，或。You are working with an empty string, or . 因為其屬性會傳回 0，操作索引會擲回的任何嘗試例外狀況。Because its property returns 0, any attempt to manipulate it by index throws an exception. 下列範例中，定義`GetFirstCharacter`方法會傳回字串的第一個字元。The following example, defines a `GetFirstCharacter` method that returns the first character of a string. 如果字串是空的最終字串傳遞至方法，方法會擲回例外狀況。If the string is empty, as the final string passed to the method is, the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/EmptyString1.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/EmptyString1.vb#15)] 您可以藉由測試來消除例外狀況是否的字串大於零，或藉由呼叫方法，以確保字串不是`null`或空白。You can eliminate the exception by testing whether the string's is greater than zero or by calling the method to ensure that the string is not `null` or empty. 下列程式碼片段會執行第二個項目。The following code fragment does the latter. 在此情況下，該字串是否`null`或空的`GetFirstCharacter`方法會傳回 u+0000。In this case, if the string is `null` or empty, the `GetFirstCharacter` method returns U+0000. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/EmptyString1.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/EmptyString1.vb#16)] - 裡面的字串，該字串，內子字串的位置為基礎，您已無法判斷是否已確實找到子字串。You're manipulating a string based on the position of a substring within that string, and you've failed to determine whether the substring was actually found. 下列範例會擷取兩個字片語的第二個文字。The following example extracts the second word of a two-word phrase. 它會擲回片語和組成只有一個字，因此不包含內嵌的空格字元，如果例外狀況。It throws an exception if the phrase consists of only one word, and therefore does not contain an embedded space character. 這是因為呼叫方法會傳回-1，表示搜尋失敗，而且這個無效的值再傳遞給方法。This occurs because the call to the method returns -1 to indicate that the search failed, and this invalid value is then passed to the method. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/NoFind1.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/NoFind1.vb#17)] 若要排除例外狀況，驗證字串搜尋方法之前呼叫的字串操作方法傳回的值。To eliminate the exception, validate the value returned by the string search method before calling the string manipulation method. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/NoFind2.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/NoFind2.vb#18)] - 您已嘗試擷取目前字串的範圍之外的子字串。You've attempted to extract a substring that is outside the range of the current string. 擷取所有需要您指定的子字串，並不會繼續的子字串中的字元數的字串結尾的子字串的開始位置的子字串的方法。The methods that extract substrings all require that you specify the starting position of the substring and, for substrings that do not continue to the end of the string, the number of characters in the substring. 請注意，這不是*index*子字串中的最後一個字元。Note that this is not the *index* of the last character in the substring. 例外狀況通常是因為擲回在此情況下計算您所不正確的子字串中的字元數。An exception is typically thrown in this case because you've incorrectly calculated the number of characters in the substring. 如果您使用的搜尋方法，例如找出的起始和結束位置的子字串：If you are using a search method like to identify the starting and ending positions of a substring: - 如果所傳回的結束位置中的字元是指要包含在子字串中，公式所指定的子字串的結束位置If the character in the ending position returned by is to be included in the substring, the ending position of the substring is given by the formula ``` endIndex - startIndex + 1 ``` - 如果所傳回的結束位置中的字元要排除的子字串，從公式所指定的子字串的結束位置If the character in the ending position returned by is to be excluded from the substring, the ending position of the substring is given by the formula ``` endIndex - startIndex ``` 下列範例會定義`FindWords`方法，以使用方法，以識別空白字元和標點符號標記字串中，並傳回陣列，其中包含字串中找到的單字。The following example defines a `FindWords` method that uses the method to identify space characters and punctuation marks in a string and returns an array that contains the words found in the string. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/FindWords1.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/FindWords1.vb#19)] 負數的數字給方法的引數，只需要正數和零，或經過為負數或零到需要只正數的引數的方法。You have passed a negative number to a method with an argument that requires only positive numbers and zero, or you have passed either a negative number or zero to a method with an argument that requires only positive numbers. 例如，方法會要求您指定的項目數的二維陣列的每個維度中; 每個維度的有效值的範圍從 0 到。For example, the method requires that you specify the number of elements in each dimension of a two-dimensional array; valid values for each dimension can range from 0 to . 但因為維度引數，在下列範例中的值是負數，方法會擲回例外狀況。But because the dimension argument in the following example has a negative value, the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/OOR1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/OOR1.vb#1)] 若要更正錯誤，請確定無效的引數的值為非負數。To correct the error, ensure that the value of the invalid argument is non-negative. 您可以藉由提供有效的值，如下列程式碼片段。You can do this by providing a valid value, as the following code fragment does. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/OOR1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/OOR1.vb#2)] 您可以也驗證輸入，如果它是無效的採取某些動作。You can also validate the input and, if it is invalid, take some action. 下列程式碼片段會顯示一則錯誤訊息而不是呼叫方法。The following code fragment displays an error message instead of calling the method. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/OOR1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/OOR1.vb#3)] 應用程式是多執行緒或工作，以非同步方式執行，並更新陣列或集合中出現競爭情形。A race condition exists in an app that is multithreaded or has tasks that execute asynchronously and that updates an array or collection. 下列範例會使用要填入集合物件`Continent`物件。The following example uses a object to populate a collection of `Continent` objects. 它會擲回如果範例會嘗試將完全填入集合之前，顯示 7 個項目集合中的例外狀況。It throws an exception if the example attempts to display the seven items in the collection before the collection is fully populated. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/Race1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/Race1.vb#11)] 在此情況下，從多個執行緒存取兩個資源：In this case, two resources are accessed from multiple threads: - `continents` 集合。The `continents` collection. 其從多個執行緒呼叫方法。Its method is called from multiple threads. 此外，主要執行緒會假設它會逐一查看其成員時，內含七個元素完全填入集合。In addition, the main or primary thread assumes the collection is fully populated with seven elements when it iterates its members. - `msg`從多個執行緒會串連的字串。The `msg` string, which is concatenated from multiple threads. 若要更正錯誤，請確定共用的狀態以執行緒安全的方式，在中，如下所示存取。To correct the error, ensure that shared state is accessed in a thread-safe way, as follows. - 如果您的應用程式會使用陣列或集合的物件，請考慮使用安全執行緒集合類別，例如中的型別命名空間或外的頻外版本。if your app uses an array or collection object, consider using a thread-safe collection class, such as the types in the namespace or the out-of-band release. - 確定共用的狀態 （亦即，資源可以由多個執行緒存取） 存取具備執行緒安全的方式，以便一次只有一個執行緒擁有資源的獨佔存取權。Ensure that shared state (that is, resources that can be accessed by multiple threads) is accessed in a thread-safe way, so that only one thread at a time has exclusive access to the resources. 大量的類別，例如， ， ，和，可用來同步處理資源的存取權。A large number of classes, such as , , , and , are available to synchronize access to resources. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 執行緒](~/docs/standard/threading/index.md)。For more information, see [Threading](~/docs/standard/threading/index.md). 此外，語言支援是透過[鎖定](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/lock-statement.md)C# 中的陳述式並[SyncLock](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/synclock-statement.md)建構在 Visual Basic 中。In addition, language support is available through the [lock](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/lock-statement.md) statement in C# and the [SyncLock](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/synclock-statement.md) construct in Visual Basic. 下列範例位址例外狀況和上一個範例中的其他問題。The following example addresses the exception and the other issues from the previous example. 它會取代物件物件，以確定對集合的存取是安全執行緒，會使用物件，以確定應用程式執行緒會繼續其他執行緒已執行，並使用鎖定來確保之後，才只有一個執行緒可以存取`msg`變數一次。It replaces the object with a object to ensure that access to the collection is thread-safe, uses a object to ensure that the application thread continues only after other threads have executed, and uses a lock to ensure that only one thread can access the `msg` variable at a time. [!code-csharp[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/cs/Race2.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException/vb/Race2.vb#12)] 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENTOUTOFRANGE，其值 0x80131502。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENTOUTOFRANGE, which has the value 0x80131502. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors. ## Examples 下列範例會定義類別可以包含受邀的來賓的相關資訊。The following example defines a class to contain information about an invited guest. 如果客體是 21 歲擲回例外狀況。If the guest is younger than 21, an exception is thrown. [!code-csharp[ArgumentOutOfRangeException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ArgumentOutOfRangeException/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ArgumentOutOfRangeException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ArgumentOutOfRangeException/VB/program.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如 「 非負值數字所需。 」This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Nonnegative number required." 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string paramName) cil managed

param.name: paramName
param.span: 造成這個例外狀況的參數名稱。

span.span: The name of the parameter that causes this exception.

summary.span: 使用造成這個例外狀況的參數名稱來初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the name of the parameter that causes this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如 「 非負值數字所需。 」This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Nonnegative number required." 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。This message takes into account the current system culture. 這個建構函式使用 參數來初始化新執行個體的 `paramName` 屬性。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using the `paramName` parameter. `paramName` 的內容必須能讓人了解。The content of `paramName` is intended to be understood by humans. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||空字串 ("")。The empty string ("").| ||參數名稱的字串。The parameter name string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Protected Sub New (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: info
param.span: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

span.span: The object that holds the serialized object data.

param.name: context

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).

related.span: XML 和 SOAP 序列化

span.span: XML and SOAP Serialization

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性使用的值的新執行個體`message`參數。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using the value of the `message` parameter. `message` 參數的內容必須能讓人了解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 這個建構函式使用 參數來初始化新執行個體的 `paramName` 屬性。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using the `paramName` parameter. `paramName` 的內容必須能讓人了解。The content of `paramName` is intended to be understood by humans. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`.`null`.| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.| ||參數名稱的字串。The parameter name string.|

MemberSignature.Value: public ArgumentOutOfRangeException (string paramName, object actualValue, string message);

param.name: paramName
param.span: 造成例外狀況的參數名稱。

param.name: actualValue

The message that describes the error.

summary.span: 使用參數名稱引數值和指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the parameter name, the value of the argument, and a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體使用的屬性`paramName`參數屬性使用`actualValue`參數，而屬性使用`message`參數。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using the `paramName` parameter, the property using the `actualValue` parameter, and the property using the `message` parameter. 內容`paramName`和`message`參數要讓人了解。The content of the `paramName` and `message` parameters is intended to be understood by humans. 這個建構函式的呼叫端，才能確保這些字串，已當地語系化為目前系統文化特性。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that these strings have been localized for the current system culture. `actualValue`參數不是.NET Framework 類別庫中。The `actualValue` parameter is not used within the .NET Framework class library. 不過，屬性提供，讓應用程式可以使用提供的引數的值。However, the property is provided so that applications can use the available argument value. `actualValue`參數包含無效的值傳遞給方法，就會擲回此例外狀況。The `actualValue` parameter contains an invalid value that is passed to the method and causes this exception to be thrown. 這個值會儲存在屬性和它的字串表示附加至保留在訊息字串屬性。This value is stored in the property and its string representation is appended to the message string held in the property. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||引數值。The argument value.| ||Null 參考 (`Nothing` Visual Basic 中)。The null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.| ||參數名稱的字串。The parameter name string.|

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property ActualValue As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ ActualValue { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得造成這個例外狀況的引數值。

span.span: Gets the argument value that causes this exception.

value.span: ，包含造成目前 的參數值。

span.span: An that contains the value of the parameter that caused the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來擷取無效的引數。Use this property to retrieve the invalid argument. `ActualValue`屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞給建構函式，或`null`如果已不提供任何值。The `ActualValue` property returns the same value that was passed to the constructor, or `null` if no value was supplied. 屬性在物件建構時指派值。The property is assigned a value at the time of object construction. 如果屬性值不是`null`，值的字串表示附加至所持有的訊息字串屬性。If the property value is not `null`, a string representation of the value is appended to the message string held by the property. 屬性不是.NET Framework 類別庫中。The property is not used within the .NET Framework class library. 它會在所有的 null 值擲回的.NET Framework 類別庫的物件。It carries a null value in all the objects thrown by the .NET Framework class library. 屬性提供，讓應用程式可以使用提供的引數的值。The property is provided so that applications can use the available argument value. 此屬性是唯讀的而且只有在要自訂的內容或值的格式應該覆寫。This property is read-only and should be overridden only to customize the content or format of the value.
